question: There are 136 second-graders at Maple Grove School. 47 of them are girls. On Friday, 7 second-grade girls and 8 second-grade boys were absent. How many second grade boys were at Maple Grove School on Friday?
answer:
Of the 136 second graders, 47 are girls, so 136 students - 47 girls = <<136-47=89>>89 boys.
On Friday there were 89 boys - 8 absent = <<89-8=81>>81 boys.
#### 81
